name: Manny Montes
description:
'''Emmanuel Rodríguez''', better known as '''Manny Montes''', is a Puerto Rican rapper, known one of the major Christian artists in Puerto Rico. He has been nominated multiple times for the [[Arpa Awards|Premios Arpa]] and recently, at the Tu Música Urbana Awards for "Mejor canción cristiana".

He has more than 10 collaborative albums, where hundreds of different artists have participated, including [[Luis Raul Marrero|Funky]], [[Redimi2]], [[Alex Zurdo]], [[Indiomar]], [[Farruko]], [[Mexicano 777]], etc., sharing the stage with artists like [[Marcos Witt]] and [[Tercer Cielo]].
